body:
Thanks a lot! I updated the code according your suggestions and now the runtime gets very closed to the best perf as in V1 !
```
>>> a = torch.randn(1000, 1000)
>>> %timeit -r 100 a.flip(0, 1)
3.04 ms ± 912 µs per loop (mean ± std. dev. of 100 runs, 100 loops each)
```
